The Blood Blamish Snail is a type of snail which live in the north-east part of Mort Myre Swamp. A chisel can be used on the dropped shell to make a blood'n'tar snelm which gains the player 32.5 crafting XP. This is the same for all snelms. They also provide bonus protection against Mort Myre snail attacks.

The '''Blood Blamish Snail''' is a type of snail which live in the north-east part of [[Mort Myre Swamp]]. A [[chisel]] can be used on the dropped shell to make a [[blood'n'tar snelm]] which gains the player 32.5 crafting XP. This is the same for all snelms. They also provide bonus protection against [[Mort Myre]] snail attacks.
